definition[0]: a living thing, especially a person
example[1]: a story about alien beings who invade Earth
definition[1]: the most important quality or nature of something, especially of a person
example[2]: The whole of her being had been taken over by a desire to return to her homeland.
definition[3]: used to give the reason for something
example[3]: Being a quiet sort of person, I didn’t want to get involved.
example[4]: You can’t expect them to sit still for that long, children being what they are.
